sentence.Network_en: Her eyes were fixed on the waxen face of her son, willing him to live.
sentence.Network_cn: 她凝视着儿子苍白的脸，盼着他好起来。

sentence.Network_en: He drew near because it was waxen and fresh.
sentence.Network_cn: 他接近这朵百合花,因为这花儿温柔清新.

sentence.Network_en: You don't look well - you've got a waxen face.
sentence.Network_cn: 你看来不舒服,脸色苍白.

entry.def: A waxen face is very pale and looks very unhealthy.

example.ex: Her eyes were fixed on the waxen face of her son, willing him to live.
example.tran: 她凝视着儿子苍白的脸，盼着他好起来。

means.word_mean: 1. made of or covered with wax;

sentences.sentence: "the poor face with the same awful waxen pallor"- Bram Stoker
"the soldier turned his waxlike features toward him"
"a thin face with a waxy paleness"

auth_sentence.content: She...watched the life slip away from their waxen faces.
auth_sentence.res_content: She...watched the life slip away from their waxen faces.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She...watched the life slip away from their waxen faces.

auth_sentence.content: If thy brother bee waxen poore, and fallen in decay with thee.
auth_sentence.res_content: If thy brother bee waxen poore, and fallen in decay with thee.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If thy brother bee waxen poore, and fallen in decay with thee.

auth_sentence.content: The men had the gray, waxen look that even freshly dead people acquire.
auth_sentence.res_content: The men had the gray, waxen look that even freshly dead people acquire.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The men had the gray, waxen look that even freshly dead people acquire.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表动词,"变成"; 2. 表形容词,"由……制成的",通常加在名词后面; 3. 表名词,"人或物"

stems_affixes.word_buile: strait海峡,困难+en变成→adj.艰难的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 金黄色的;贵重的,极好的
stems_affixes.word_buile: gold金+en由……制成的→adj.金黄色的;贵重的,极好的
oak橡树+en由……制成的→adj.橡木制的
wax蜡+en由……制成的→adj.蜡的,蜡制的
wood木头+en由……制成的→adj.木制的;呆笨的
wool羊毛+en由……制成的→adj. 羊毛[制]的;毛纺的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 未婚的,纯洁的,无经验的
stems_affixes.word_buile: maid少女+en人或物→n.少女,处女 adj.未婚的,纯洁的,无经验的
chick小鸡+en人或物→n.鸡肉;鸡,小鸡,小鸟
city城市+en人或物→citizen
heath荒野,树丛+en人或物→n.异教徒
kit=cat猫+en人或物→kitten
maid少女+en人或物→n.少女,处女 adj.未婚的,纯洁的,无经验的
vix雌狐+en人或物→n.雌狐,泼妇
ward守卫,看守+en人或物→n.看守人,管理员
bright明亮的+en变成→v.[使]变亮,[使]愉快
broad宽+en变成→v.放宽,变阔
damp潮湿+en变成→v.[使]潮湿,使沮丧,泼凉水
dark黑+en变成→v.[使]变黑[变暗]
fright惊骇,吃惊+en变成→v.使惊吓;惊恐
hast匆忙+en变成→v.催促 v.赶紧
length长,长度+en变成→v.延长,[使]变长
sharp尖+en变成→v.削尖,使敏锐
short短+en变成→v.弄短,缩小,减少
sweet甜+en变成→v.使变甜 v.变甜
threat恐吓,凶兆,威胁I+en变成→v.恐吓,威胁
tight紧的+en变成→v.变紧,绷紧,拉紧
wake叫醒+en变成→v.醒来 v.唤醒
weak弱的+en变成→v.削弱,[使]变弱
